result.name: population_estimates_by_broad_ethnic_group_broad_age_and_sex
result.notes:
This dataset contains estimates of the population by ethnic group and sex
Source: Office for National Statistics (ONS): Population and Demography / Ethnic Estimates and Projections
Publisher: Neighbourhood Statistics
Geographies: Local Authority District (LAD), Government Office Region (GOR), National
Geographic coverage: England
Time coverage: 2001 to 2007
Type of data: Modelled data

odi-certificate.title: Population estimates by broad ethnic group, broad age and sex

organization.name: office-for-national-statistics
organization.title: Office for National Statistics
organization.description:
The Office for National Statistics (ONS) is the UK’s largest independent producer of official statistics and is the recognised national statistical institute for the UK. It is responsible for collecting and publishing statistics related to the economy, population and society at national, regional and local levels. It also conducts the census in England and Wales every ten years. 

The ONS plays a leading role in national and international good practice in the production of official statistics. It is the executive office of the UK Statistics Authority and although they are separate, they are still closely related.

result.precision: #These are experimental statistics. 2001 - 2003 data are the first release of these estimates and validation of the statistics is continuing. Whilst the data have not been shown to reach the quality standards required of National Statistics, release as Experimental Statistics is intended to encourage comment on the methodology and validation of the estimates.#Rounded to the nearest 100 persons.
result.title: Population estimates by broad ethnic group, broad age and sex
